note.p: Farmer. Of Keymer, Sussex. Married Martha Hamshar at Streat, Sussex, in 1811. Brother of John Jenner Weir’s mother, Elizabeth, and father of John Jenner Weir’s wife, Mary Ann.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1642/548/12)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 December 2019)
will of Thomas Jenner, his brother, d. 1834 (East Sussex RO SAS-WG/91)
